lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Wednesday about the election of the former Ranger Brian Leetch, the Devils executive Lou Lamoriello and three others to the Hockey Hall of Fame misidentified the memorable series in 1994 in which the Rangers defeated the Devils. It was the Eastern Conference finals, not semifinals.
